description: XXXG-01D2 Gundam Deathscythe Hell (aka Deathscythe Hell, Deathscythe), is the upgraded version of XXXG-01D Gundam Deathscythe in Mobile Suit Gundam Wing. The suit was redesigned by Hajime Katoki for the movie sequel Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz. The unit is piloted by Duo Maxwell.
name: XXXG-01D2 Gundam Deathscythe Hell
